abstract: Under pressure from many shareholders for its poor performance and for its failure to complete a deal with Microsoft, Yahoo is reorganizing itself again.
snippet: Under pressure from many shareholders for its poor performance and for its failure to complete a deal with Microsoft, Yahoo is reorganizing itself again.
lead_paragraph: SUNNYVALE, Calif.  Under pressure from many shareholders for its poor performance and for its failure to complete a deal with Microsoft, Yahoo is doing something it has done several times before: reorganizing itself.

headline.main: Another Yahoo Overhaul as It Tries to Right Itself
headline.print_headline: Another Yahoo Overhaul As It Tries to Right Itself

abstract: As Bill Gates moves on, it will be up to successors to master the Internet’s challenges or see Microsoft’s stature erode.
snippet: As Bill Gates moves on, it will be up to successors to master the Internet’s challenges or see Microsoft’s stature erode.
lead_paragraph: Bill Gates is retiring, sort of. He is still only 52, and he is going off to spend more time guiding the world’s richest philanthropy, the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation. He will still be Microsoft’s chairman and largest shareholder, but Friday is his last day as a full-time worker at the software giant, marking the unofficial end of his career as a business leader.

headline.main: Microsoft Seeks Path Beyond Gates’s Legacy
headline.print_headline: Gates Departs, and Microsoft Seeks Path Beyond His Legacy

abstract: Microsoft has agreed to buy Silicon Valley semantic search engine Powerset, Venture Beat reported. The acquisition price is rumored to be slightly more than $100 million with an announcement expected in July.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft has agreed to buy Silicon Valley semantic search engine Powerset, Venture Beat reported. The acquisition price is rumored to be slightly more than $100 million with an announcement expected in July.

headline.main: Microsoft Said to Find Deal for Powerset

abstract: Under pressure from many shareholders for its poor performance and for its failure to complete a deal with Microsoft, Yahoo is doing something it has done several times before: reorganizing itself.
lead_paragraph: Under pressure from many shareholders for its poor performance and for its failure to complete a deal with Microsoft, Yahoo is doing something it has done several times before: reorganizing itself.

headline.main: Another Yahoo Overhaul as It Tries to Right Itself

abstract: An e-mail from a Yahoo employee offers an eye-opening peek into the frustration of many Yahoos.
snippet: An e-mail from a Yahoo employee offers an eye-opening peek into the frustration of many Yahoos.
lead_paragraph: As Yahoo’s shares head for their lowest close since Microsoft made public its takeover offer on February 1, it isn’t hard to find Yahoo critics both inside and outside the company.
